label: @EXCPITEMSLID
description: This variable corresponds to the EXCPITEM:ID field in the current exception item

label: @EXCPITEMSLIDTYPE
description: This variable corresponds to the EXCPITEM:IDTYPE field in the current exception item

label: @EXCPITEMBATCHID
description: This variable corresponds to the EXCPITEM:BATCHID field in the current exception item

label: @EXCPITEMBRANCH
description: This variable corresponds to the EXCPITEM:BRANCH field in the current exception item

label: @EXCPITEMNUMBER
description: This variable corresponds to the EXCPITEM:CH6:1 field in the current exception item

label: @EXCPITEMAMOUNT
description: This variable corresponds to the EXCPITEM:AMOUNT:1 field in the current exception item

label: @EXCPITEMPROCESSORACCOUNT
description: This variable corresponds to the EXCPITEM:PROCESSORACCOUNT field in the current exception item

label: @EXCPITEMACCOUNT
description: This variable corresponds to the EXCPITEM:EXCPITEMACCOUNT field in the current exception item

label: @EXCPITEMCOMPANYNAME
description: This variable corresponds to the EXCPITEM:CH16 field in the current exception item

label: @EXCPITEMREASONCODE
description: This variable corresponds to the EXCPITEM:REASONCODE field in the current exception item

label: @EXCPITEMACHEXCPREASON
description: This variable corresponds to the EXCPITEM:ACHEXCPREASON field in the current exception item

label: @EXCPITEMTYPE
description:
This field can have the following values, based on the type of exception:
0 - Draft Exception
1 - ACH Exception
2 - ATM Exception
3 - Credit/Debit Card Exception
4 - Fee Exception
5 - Insurance Exception
6 - Misc Post Exception
7 - Payroll Exception
8 - Distribution Exception
9 - Memo Exception

label: @EXCPITEMTOTALNSF
description: This is a special variable that indicates the total of the @EXCPITEMAMOUNT for each exception item processed thus far (in the current Exception Item Repeat FM session) that has the same @EXCPITEMACCOUNT, @EXCPITEMSLIDTYPE, and @EXCPITEMSLID as the current exception item and has been coded as a force pay item. A force pay item is any item whose @EXCPITEMREASONCODE is equal to either 41 or 42 and @EXCPITEMTYPE equal to 0, or any item whose @EXCPITEMACHEXCPREASON is equal to either S41 or S42 and @EXCPITEMTYPE is equal to 1.
